toolbar.refreshQuotaTooltip:
Preheat Account Quota Reset Time

Quotas usually start their reset cycle only after first usage. This feature force-starts the timer for idle accounts.

Example: Free accounts reset every 7 days.
If you wait until Wednesday to use an account, it resets next Wednesday.
If you use Preheat today, the reset timer starts immediately.

emptyState.title: No Accounts Available
emptyState.description: After logging into Antigravity, this program will automatically detect accounts.
